title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Park County Fair, day. South Park is more spread out these days. Looking like a small city now. People mill around. The boys walk along a fairway. Cartman pulls out a small firecracker and tosses it on the ground before Kyle and cackles softly

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Stop it, Cartman!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Pfaha, so funny.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Goddamnit Cartman, stope throwin' those stupid popping things at me!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Come on and take a look, folks. We've got a lot of knives for sale here.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Oh my God, look!  Martial arts weapons from the Far East.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Wow, cool.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Dude! We should each buy a weapon, and then we'll be like ninjas.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Yeah. We won't have to take crap from anybody.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Our parents won't let us have weapons, dude.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Who's gonna tell them, dumbass?!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Yeah, dude, our parents are gonna be at the stupid fair all day long. They'll never know what we bought.  I'll get the tonfas.  Those are so sweet.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: I'm gonna get those killer sai.  Look Kenny! There's something even you can afford! A ninja shuriken  for a dollar ninety nine.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: (Shuriken. Awesome!)

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Can I help you boys?

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Yeah. We wanna get one of each of these ninja weapons.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Okay, uh, you need to have your parents here when you buy them, though. I, I can't sell to anyone under eighteen without parents' permission.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Parents? Parents??  Oh God!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Uh wha, what's the matter?

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: We, we're brothers, see, and our parents... died in a car accident last year.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Why?!  Why?! Why did you have to take them both?! Why!  Why?!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Why do people have to keep reminding us of what we don't have??

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: It's all right, it's all right boys. Don't cry, I'll... I'll just... go pack these up for you, okay?

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Goddamn, that's like the twelfth time that's worked.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Cartman's house, moments later. The boys are in his basement mastering their new weapons. Each boy gets the weapon he wanted. Kyle gets the yellow-ended nunchakus

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Kiya! Kiya!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Kaii yo!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Giya! Shut up, hippies! I'll kill you! Iya!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: With my tonfa of Takanawa, I become the great and powerful ninja Sharohachi, born to fight evil and people I don't like.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Yeah. And my powerful nunchakus make me into Bounaku , a deadly but compassionate ninja who protects those in trouble.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: What's your ninja name, Kenny?

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: (unintelligible)

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Yes. And I... am Bulrog. Tough brute ninja who has dedicated his life to eradicating the world of hippies

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: All right, ninjas! Let's go protect the world!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Kick ass!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Outside, the neighborhood. The boys walk out onto a new, more-detailed landscape

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Hey you guys, you know what we should do? We should go show our weapons to Craig and those guys. They'll be so jealous.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: (Hey yeah, that'd be awesome!)

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: No dude, we can't go around showing our weapons to people. Our parents'll find out we have them.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Ech! You see, guys? This is why Jews can't be ninjas! They've got no spine!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: You don't know anything about Jews, fatass!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Oh yeah?! My mom took me to see Mel Gibson's movie, The Passion, and Mel Gibson says you are a sloth and you are a liar. And if the Road Warrior says it, it must be true.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Don't worry, Kyle. Craig's not gonna tell on us. Come, ninjas, let's go. All right, this is it.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Yes. The residence of the one called... Craig.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: I still say this is a bad idea.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Craig's house. Stan pounds on the door

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Ninja positions!  Hello, Craig!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Look what we got.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Where'd you get those?

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: We can't tell you where we got 'em! It's secret ninja stuff.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Oooh, is that jealousy I see in your eyes, Craig? Mmm, yes, drown me in the sweet water of your envy.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Uh, uh, they're not that cool.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Hyeah, "they're not that cool." These are real authentic weapons from the Far East.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: But don't tell anybody we have them.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Ugh.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Whoa! Where'd you get those??

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Let me see.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Uh, we'd love to hang out guys, but we have important secret work to do.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Yes. The life of a ninja is complex and full of peril.  Come on, ninjas!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Ho!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: On the road

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Ho man, did you see the look on Craig's face?! That was awesome!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Dude, we're like the coolest kids in the whole state!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Huhey fellas. What's happenin'?

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: We're playing Ninjas, Butters.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Wowee! Hey, can I play, uhninjas with you?

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: No, Butters. We are a very select elite fighting team sent to protect the world from evil, and you can't play with us.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Yeah, Butters. You wouldn't make a very good ninja. Come on, guys.  We have a lot of work to do.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Yes, and no time to do it. No time...

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: I think I'd make a really good ninja. Jeez, those guys never let me play with them. Uh they just shun me all the time.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Butter's house. He walks past behind the couch, where his mom reads a book unaware of the emotion in his voice

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: I'm a lost soul. A dark lonely shadow of a person-

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Hi Butters.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Hi Mom.  -a castaway, forced to live his life out in solitude.  And it's because of times like these I was forced to a life of evil.  Society cast me out, and so I vowed to make them all pay! And pay they did! Nobody knows that beneath this sweet eight-year-old little boy lies the most evil, the most destructive supervillain of all time! Professor Chaos!  Let's see how you like dealing with me, ninjas!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Oooh, Butters, are you going out to play again?

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Yeah Mom, I'm jus' goin' outside for a little while.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Well, could you be a sweetie and take that pie over there to the Thomsons. I made it to thank them for babysitting you last week.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Well, okay-okay Mom.  Bah! Gah!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: On the road. The boys are shown in their anime forms

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Hm, this doesn't seem to be the right way. My ninja sense is telling me we might be heading in the wrong direction.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Okay, hang on guys. I'll use my special power to see into the future and find out where we should head next.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Hold on you guys. I actually have another power. I can see into the future too, but better than Kyle. Let me try it.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Goddamnit, Cartman! You can't keep making up new powers!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Yeah dude, that's like the fifth power you've come up with!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: I am Bulrog and I have lots and lots of powers.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: No asshole! From now on you only get to have ONE power! So what is it?!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: I have the power to have all the powers I want.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: That doesn't count, fatass!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Yeah, that it, Cartman! You don't get to have any powers!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: C'mon!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Haaa hahahaha!  Well well well! If it isn't the four ninjas!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Who the hell is that??

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: I dunno. Craig, is that you?

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Fools!  I am Professor Chaos! Bringer of Destruction and Doom!  Your feeble ninja powers are no match for me!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Whoa.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Looks like we have a sworn enemy, you guys.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: (Yeah.)

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Very well, Professor Chaos! We'll play along. Now, fell the fiery sting of my tonfa Takanawa!  Hey kid, that knocks you down.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Nuh uh!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Yeah huh, I got you!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Nuh uh! Because my cloak is made of a ...titanium alloy that shields me from heat!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: That's bullcrap! Titanium alloy my ass!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Well, let's see how he likes the icy blasts from my nunchakus Sokuromoto!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Huh nice attempt, ninja! But now both of you shall feel the power of my Web of Holding!  Hahahahaha! You are both trapped in spiderwebs!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: All right, dickhole! Time for you to pay!  Oh no! I have no powers! Kyle took them away from me! Quick, Kyle, give me back my powers so I can fight this evil villain!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Okay, okay, you can have your powers back.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: All right! And now I will use my power to...  turn Kyle into a chicken! Bleh!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Goddamnit Cartman!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Hahahahahaaa ha! Now you are a chicken! Nyanyanyanyanyaaa nya!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Enough! Uh I grow weary of your foolishness. Professor Chaos cannot be stopped!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Oh yeah?! Kenny! Use your ninja star!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: (Yeah! Take this, Professor Chaos!) (Feel my wrath!)

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Oh, fuck dude!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: It's Butters. Oh my God!  Oh, dude! It's stuck in his eye!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: What the hell did you do that for, Kenny?!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: (I just threw it like Stan asked me.)

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: It hurts! It hurts!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Oh man! We are in serious trouble!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Ssh sshhhh. It's okay, Butters. Calm down. It's not that bad, really.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: But I... But I... But I can't see nothin'. I gotta go to the hospitalll!!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Okay okay, calm down, Butters! It'll be okay!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Guys, meeting over here for a second? All right you guys, we need to stay calm and just do the right thing. We have to kill Butters and bury him in Kyle's backyard.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Dude, shut up!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: I agree with Cartman!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: What??

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: You don't understand what my mom will do to me if she finds out I was playing with weapons!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: a closeup of the shuriken lodged in Butters' left eye, moments later. Some pliers clamp on to it and the camera pulls back. Stan is holding the pliers and he tugs gently at the shuriken. Butters sits on a tree stump

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Just stay still, Butters.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Hwa.  Hwa!  Hwaaaaa!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Go ahead and scramble it, then he won't remember it was us.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: You guys can't fix my eyeball! You have to take me to the hospital!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: If we take him to the hospital, they're gonna find out what happened.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: God-damnit!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: God? Please, if you get me out of this, I swear, I will never play with weapons ever again.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Don't be so quick to throw off your ninja responsibility, Kyle.  Now, come on guys, sure, it's easy to be a ninja when everything's going your way, but it's times like these, when the chips are down, that a ninja shows his true character.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Whoa, I'm getting woozy.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Shut up, Butters.  Now, there's a way out of this. We just have to use our... ninja reasoning.

text: We... need a doctor... But we can't go to the hospital. Wait a minute. Wait, wait, wait what about the veterinarian?

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Ohoo but, but fellas, if I, if I dress up like a dog with a star in my eye, I I'm gonna get grounded.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Shut up, Butters!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: That is the dumbest idea you guys have ever come up with! I'd expect this stupidity out of Cartman, but you, Stan?? Butters needs medical attention right now!!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: All right, then you take him to the hospital, Kyle. You take him to the hospital and let your mom find out what happened.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS

text: Hell's Pass Hospital, day. Butters closes in on it, babbling incoherently and stumbling along. He enters the emergency area, moves in a few feet, and falls flat on his back

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: In our last episode the four ninjas did battle with Professor Chaos, bringer of destruction and doom. It was during that great battle that ninja master Kenny threw his star into Professor Chaos' eye. Now the ninjas were in serious trouble, because their parents might find out they had weapons if Professor Chaos told on them. While trying to get Professor Chaos some aid at the veterinarian's office, the four ninjas ran into Craig and his three friends. They challenged the four ninjas to fight, and the legendary battle of Tokutawa began. It was during this battle that Professor Chaos escaped , and so the four ninjas were forced to join forces with Craig and his friends to find Professor Chaos, or else they would all be grounded.

text: It just makes me sick how some people can treat animals.  Well, nothing we can do for it; let's put it to sleep, shall we?  Here you go, pup. I've got a sweet dose of murder for you.  What the? Blasted! He's escaped! ... Oh well, let's murder one of these other dogs.

text: Now, this lamp comes from the estate of Edna and James Hollinger, who lived in upstate Wyoming.  It has a bronze finish and actual gold leaf along the base. So we're gonna start the bidding at three hundre seventy five. Do I, do I hear three hundred and seventy five? Kid, what the hell do you think you're doin'?

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Park County Community Center, Emergency Town Meeting, day. The chatter among the adults present is heated

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: All right, people, we are all extremely upset over what's happened.  But let's try to speak one at a time.

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Well, like the rest of you, I am shocked and appalled at what happened! I don't know if the parents are to blame or if it's the times we're living in, but something has to change!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Yeah! I agree!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: This is the worst thing that's happened in this town!  The worst thing!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: Yeah! I mean, there were children watching that auction! And when that little eight-year-old boy walked up and flashed his... penis... it was an outrage!

title: GOOD TIMES WITH WEAPONS
text: What?

text: What?

text: Not only that, the auction was televised on public access, so my little daughter watchin' at home saw the -penis! How am I suppsoed to explain that to her?!
